SELECT COUNT(o.ordered_no) AS cnt FROM ordered o JOIN user u ON u.user_id = o.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{user_id}
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT o.ordered_no) AS cnt FROM ordered o JOIN user u ON u.user_id = o.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{user_id} AND o.ordered_status = 'CC'

SELECT o.ordered_no, date(o.ordered_date) as ordered_date, p.product_name, ( SELECT SUM(od2.ordered_detail_quantity) FROM ordered_detail od2 WHERE od2.ordered_no = o.ordered_no ) AS ordered_detail_totalquantity, ordered_detail_total_price, o.ordered_status, category_name FROM ordered o JOIN ordered_detail od ON o.ordered_no = od.ordered_no JOIN product p ON od.product_no = p.product_no JOIN category c ON c.category_no = p.category_no JOIN user u ON u.user_id = o.user_id WHERE od.ordered_detail_no = ( SELECT MIN(ordered_detail_no) FROM ordered_detail WHERE ordered_no = o.ordered_no ) AND u.user_id = #{user_id} GROUP BY o.ordered_no, o.ordered_date, p.product_name, o.ordered_status, od.ordered_detail_total_price, category_name ORDER BY o.ordered_no DESC;

SELECT o.ordered_no, date(o.ordered_date) as ordered_date, p.product_name, ( SELECT SUM(od2.ordered_detail_quantity) FROM ordered_detail od2 WHERE od2.ordered_no = o.ordered_no ) AS ordered_detail_totalquantity, ordered_detail_total_price, o.ordered_status, category_name FROM ordered o JOIN ordered_detail od ON o.ordered_no = od.ordered_no JOIN product p ON od.product_no = p.product_no JOIN category c ON c.category_no = p.category_no JOIN user u ON u.user_id = o.user_id WHERE od.ordered_detail_no = ( SELECT MIN(ordered_detail_no) FROM ordered_detail WHERE ordered_no = o.ordered_no ) AND u.user_id = #{user_id} AND ( o.ordered_status = 'CW' OR o.ordered_status = 'CC' ) GROUP BY o.ordered_no, o.ordered_date, p.product_name, o.ordered_status, od.ordered_detail_total_price, category_name ORDER BY o.ordered_no DESC;

SELECT o.ordered_no, DATE(o.ordered_date) AS ordered_date, u.user_name, o.ordered_status, od.ordered_detail_total_price, pm.payment_method, o.ordered_name, o.ordered_address, o.ordered_phone, o.ordered_note FROM ordered o JOIN ordered_detail od ON o.ordered_no = od.ordered_no JOIN product p ON od.product_no = p.product_no JOIN category c ON c.category_no = p.category_no JOIN user u ON u.user_id = o.user_id JOIN payment pm ON pm.user_id = u.user_id WHERE o.ordered_no = #{ordered_no} GROUP BY o.ordered_no, o.ordered_date, u.user_name, o.ordered_status, pm.payment_method, o.ordered_name, o.ordered_address, o.ordered_phone, o.ordered_note, od.ordered_detail_total_price ORDER BY o.ordered_no DESC

SELECT od.ordered_detail_no, c.category_name, p.product_name, od.ordered_detail_quantity, od.ordered_detail_unit_price FROM ordered o JOIN ordered_detail od ON o.ordered_no = od.ordered_no JOIN product p ON od.product_no = p.product_no JOIN category c ON c.category_no = p.category_no WHERE o.ordered_no = #{ordered_no} ORDER BY od.ordered_detail_no

SELECT DISTINCT od.ordered_detail_no, c.category_name, p.product_name, p.product_author, p.product_publisher, p.product_price, DATE(o.ordered_date) AS ordered_date, p.product_no, attachment_detail_new_name FROM ordered o JOIN ordered_detail od ON o.ordered_no = od.ordered_no JOIN product p ON od.product_no = p.product_no JOIN category c ON c.category_no = p.category_no JOIN user u ON u.user_id = o.user_id JOIN payment pm ON pm.user_id = u.user_id JOIN attachment a ON p.product_no = a.attachment_product_no JOIN attachment_detail ad ON a.attachment_no = ad.attachment_no LEFT JOIN review r ON r.product_no = p.product_no AND r.user_id = o.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{user_id} AND o.ordered_status = 'D' AND pm.payment_type = 'PC' AND a.attachment_type = 'PT' AND r.review_no IS NULL ORDER BY od.ordered_detail_no;

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY od.ordered_detail_no DESC) AS review_seq, -- 순번을 ordered_detail_no 기준으로 p.product_name, r.review_starrating, r.review_content, DATE_FORMAT(r.review_create_at, '%Y.%m.%d') AS review_create_at, p.product_no, u.user_name FROM review r JOIN user u ON r.user_id = u.user_id JOIN product p ON p.product_no = r.product_no JOIN ordered_detail od ON p.product_no = od.product_no JOIN ordered o ON o.ordered_no = od.ordered_no WHERE u.user_id = #{user_id} AND r.review_status = 'E' ORDER BY od.ordered_detail_no DESC;

SELECT product_no, product_name, product_author, product_price, product_publisher, attachment_detail_new_name FROM product p, attachment a, attachment_detail ad WHERE product_no = #{product_no} AND p.product_no = a.attachment_product_no AND a.attachment_no = ad.attachment_no AND a.attachment_type = 'PT'
